snippet: Yankee Stadium is among the major league ballparks that will host international soccer teams in exhibitions this summer.
abstract: Yankee Stadium, Fenway Park and Wrigley Field are among the major league ballparks that will host international soccer teams in exhibitions this summer; all nine games in the World Football Challenge are exhibitions, as are 26 of the 28 other matches in North America and feature international clubs and national teams of various distinctions, MLS teams, and some minor league franchises.
lead_paragraph: Yankee Stadium is among the major league ballparks that will host international soccer teams in exhibitions this summer.

headline.seo: Baseball Parks Open Doors to International Soccer Teams
headline.main: Baseball Parks Win at Gate by Opening Their Doors to International Soccer
headline.print_headline: Baseball Parks Win at Gate by Opening Their Doors to International Soccer
